JVM terminated. Exit code=1
/usr/java/j2sdk1.4.2_03/bin/java

-os linux
-ws gtk
-arch x86
-showsplash /home/adi/apps/eclipse/2.1.2/./eclipse -showsplash 600 

This is taken from log:
!SESSION Dec 12, 2003 19:39:23.426 ---------------------------------------------
java.version=1.4.2_03
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_US

I'm using Fedora Core.

I doubt the "crash" has anything to do with this log entry. The NPE is logged, 
and processing continues. However, we will investigate the NPE.
unable to reproduce. Please provide test case if the problem persists.

Version 2.1.3 exits normally, without any error.
From my point of view this bug can be closed.
